prompt:
Nurse: Hold on a second while I figure out how I can best support you.

Patient: Six seven nineteen eighty three.

Nurse: Thank you for confirming your date of birth. I'm calling about your upcoming total knee replacement. Is this a good time to talk?

Patient: Yeah.

Nurse: Does the patient have any more information they want to share about this issue?

Patient: What issue?

Nurse: Just give me a second to work out the best way I can assist you. Give me a moment while I figure out how I can best help you.

Patient: Why are you calling?

responses.gpt4: I apologize for any confusion, Mr. O'Leary. I am calling from O'Connor Hospital regarding your total knee replacement scheduled for August 13th at 9:00 AM. We are simply carrying out a routine check to ensure you're fully prepared for your procedure and have everything you need. I also wanted to ask how your day has been so far?
responses.our_model: I apologize if I wasn't clear. I'm calling to discuss your upcoming total knee replacement surgery. It's scheduled for August 13th at 9:00 AM with Doctor Cristina Stevens. Is this a good time to talk about it?
